concept.name: ont::referential-sem
concept.comment: "The root type for all things that can be referred to: abstract meaning for THIS and IT"

concept.name: ont::domain-property
concept.comment: "these are modifiers that characterize an object/event with respect to a scale/domain (in ONT::DOMAIN)"

concept.name: ont::evaluation-attribute-val
concept.comment: "properties which need an observer to be recognized -- subjective to the observer"

concept.name: ont::acceptability-val
concept.comment: "properties having to do with good vs. bad"

concept.name: ont::good
concept.relation: wn::|adequate%5:00:00:satisfactory:00| wn::|nice%3:00:00::| wn::|good%3:00:01::| wn::|satisfactory%5:00:00:good:01| wn::|all_right%5:00:00:satisfactory:00| wn::|good%5:00:00:nice:00| wn::|satisfactory%3:00:00::| wn::|acceptable%3:00:00::| wn::|favorable%3:00:02::| wn::|alright%5:00:00:satisfactory:00|

concept.name: ont::abstract-object
concept.comment: "abstract objects, mental constructions, with no physical realization"

example.text: he performed amazingly on the exam
he performed awesomely on the exam
he performed exceptionally on the exam
he performed fabulously on the exam
he performed fantastically on the exam
They did some incredible work today.
he performed incredibly on the exam
he performed phenomenally on the exam
he performed remarkably on the exam
he performed spectacularly on the exam
he performed tremendously on the exam
he performed wonderfully on the exam
